sentences.sentence: Mr Auque was speaking at the annual New Year press conference of the European Aeronautic Defence and Space (EADS) group.
sentences.translation: Auque先生在欧洲航空防御及太空(EADS)集团新年发布会上发表讲话。

sentences.sentence: The laser can draw any shape a designer might want, according to EADS, the European Aeronautic Defence and Space Company.
sentences.translation: 据欧洲航空防卫及太空公司(EADS)称，激光可以画出设计师想要的任何形状。

sentences.sentence: On basis of that, a model which describes the evaluation for quality of large complex aeronautic product is put forward.
sentences.translation: 在此基础上，提出了一种大型复杂航空产品的质量评估模型。
